headline: A federal judge in Washington, D.C., temporarily blocked the Trump administration from deporting a wider group of people without a court hearing, a blow to one of the key parts of President Trump’s deportation campaign
Bessent says Trump admin willing to hit Russia with new sanctions in bid to end Ukraine war: ‘All options are on the table’
Israel begins heavy airstrikes ahead of Gaza City onslaught, warns Hamas fighters abroad that attacks ‘will reach them, too’

US companies doing business in China say they’re staying put despite tariffs: ‘We’re trapped’
Houthis confirm their prime minister killed in Israeli strike
Trump awarding Presidential Medal of Freedom to Rudy Giuliani after ex-NYC mayor seriously injured in harrowing car crash
Watch: Buildings destroyed and rescue efforts under way after deadly Afghanistan earthquake
Newsom, California lawmakers strike deal that would allow Uber, Lyft drivers to unionize
